content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, Jeff Regan, Investigator starts us off with his story from September 4, 1948, The House By The Sea.

(29:38) Our second story is The Ed Koster Murder Case, from Broadway Is My Beat. That episode aired October 13, 1951.

Download CaseClosed803

Your support keeps Case Closed  coming every week. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
